{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=DGN3500 |upc=606449062311 |asin=B003Y4977Q |fcc_date=08/12/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |type=wireless router, dsl modem |fcc_id=PY309200109 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Infineon |cpu1_model=PSB 50810;Infineon, PSB 50810, EL V1.2, XWAY ARX168; |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6AB160TSA-5G |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J24,, |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, J41,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9223;AR9223-4C1A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=PIFA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8366RB;RMC, RTL8366RB, 96L19S1, G926B, TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_os=Linux;2.6.20; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=NETGEARXX |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=30:46:9A, 4C:60:DE, E0:91:F5 |oui_eth=30:46:9A, 4C:60:DE, E0:91:F5 }} {{TagLine|N300 Wireless Gigabit ADSL2+ Modem Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=DGN3500|vs_id=12453}}
OEM: [[SerComm]] (YP500F-1.6)
*[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=24195 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] (specs, part numbers)
The default SSID may be '''NETGEAR'''.
